briefTitle: Study of the Effect of Armodafinil Treatment in Healthy Subjects With Excessive Sleepiness Associated With Jet Lag Disorder
officialTitle: A 3-Day, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel Group Study of the Effect of Armodafinil Treatment (50 and 150 mg/Day) in Healthy Subjects With Excessive Sleepiness Associated With Jet Lag Disorder
summary: This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel-group study of armodafinil and placebo treatment in healthy subjects with excessive sleepiness associated with jet lag disorder.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Sleep Latency (Minutes) From the Multiple Sleep Latency Test (MSLT)- Average of Four Scheduled Naps Across Days 1 and 2
